rows.name: chrome_min_version
rows.comments: Current known minimum chrome version required for compatibility

rows.value:
The `pdf` component displays pdf documents within an inline reader.

This feature is only compatible in modern browsers that use an underlying chrome version > @local.chrome_min_version

On legacy browsers will show button to open in external application instead.

rows.name: compatibility_error_message
rows.value: Embedded PDFs are not supported in this browser, please use an up-to-date version of Google Chrome to view or open in external app
rows.comments: It is better to explicitly set compatibility and open external parameters instead of using defaults as these are not currently linked to the translation system
